pkgmetadata.longdescription: Learn Clustering Techniques Through Examples and Code // Clustering methods, which (if asked) can provide step-by-step explanations of the algorithms used, as described in Ezugwu et. al., (2022) doi:10.1016/j.engappai.2022.104743; and datasets to test them on, which highlight the strengths and weaknesses of each technique, as presented in the clustering section of 'scikit-learn' (Pedregosa et al., 2011) https://jmlr.csail.mit.edu/papers/v12/pedregosa11a.html.
